text: 21.27 Ais 35.8, 52.1, 60.21, Ese 44.9, Jol 3.17, 1 Ko 6.9-10, Plp 4.3, Lep 13.8, 20.12, 21.8, 22.14-15 Binɨb tap tɨmel gach gɨpal okok, kɨli sek mɨgan anɨb ak amnɨgel tek ma mɨdeb. Tap yepɨs gɨpal okok, God kɨlop nɨgek nebeŋ dɨnɨgel tek gɨpal okok, mɨgan anɨb ak ma amnɨgabal. Chag Sipsip Ñɨluk binɨb ne, mɨj binɨb pelpel yenɨgabal yɨb kɨlop kɨl tɨk lak ak, kɨli nep mɨgan anɨb ak amnɨgabal.
